property.name: type
property.label: Media type
property.description: Type of media to be used.

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: Aspect ratio variant for image media types.

property.name: size
property.label: Image size
property.description: Display size for image media types.

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Title, used as a header in-place if showTitle is set, and in fullscreen modal.

property.name: src
property.label: Media source
property.description: URL of the target image or video.

property.name: transcriptUrl
property.label: Transcript URL
property.description: URL of the transcript, mandatory for video media types.

property.name: caption
property.label: Caption
property.description: Caption text, also used as alternative text for image media types.

property.name: sourceCaption
property.label: Source caption
property.description: Caption detailing the media source or credits.

property.name: allowFullscreen
property.label: Fullscreen allowed
property.description: Adds an action that lets the user open the media source in a modal when set.

property.name: fullscreenLabel
property.label: Fullscreen label
property.description: Label that replaces the default for the fullscreen action.

property.name: dContent
property.label: Data content
property.description: Data content markup - leave empty to get an LWR slot.

property.name: dLabel
property.label: Data label
property.description: Label that replaces the default for the display data action.

property.name: downloadUrl
property.label: Download URL
property.description: URL of a downloadable version of the media source.

property.name: downloadLabel
property.label: Download label
property.description: Label that replaces the default for the download media action.
